START.name: The centre of the Amazon rainforest
START.desc:
This is the great Amazon rainforest. 
There are trees and rich foliage everywhere. 
Everything seems to be.... alive.

LOC2.name: The galadrielic tree
LOC2.desc:
After traversing for what seemed like days through the swampy and draining terrain
an enourmous magnificent biennil stops you. It has gleaming leaves and a hardned bark
like a tree born in gods own park. After shaking yourself out of this
reverent stupor you realise what lied below this enormous structre. Under it lied several heaps of creatures....
which you, at first look mistook for its roots. You then realize the reason for its abnormal size...
Only one word comes to your mind after this shaking sight.. 
'Galadriellic'.

LOC3.name: The abnormal clearing
LOC3.desc:
Tired and spent you lean against a tree for some relief, you close your eyes and collect yourself.
You open your eyes very gently and see...
a vast open feild with no trees. It is such an unsual sight from what you consider now to be the regular
 that you slap yourself to wake from what you think is the consequence of exhaustion,
but this impossible sight does not vanish. You are baffled and belive this to be somekind of abnormailty untill...
you look at the scenery infront of you a little diffretnly. You now see the enormous numbers of stumps that throng the ground infront of you, 
the shear number of them pushes you back. You realize the cruelty depicted by the scene infront and 
fear the race you yourself belong to.
